name: Lost In Parallels
description:
Lost In Parallels is a 2D Platformer based on the exploration of parallel dimensions using a magic flashlight.
Use the flashlight to discover a new dimension. Place it carefully to change the state of the world and find your way through the next dimensions.

Features

  • 16 Unique Dimensions to Explore
  • 16 Key Objects to Collect
  • Speedrun Mode
  • Online Speedrun Leaderboard

Please note, the game is in early stage, a lot more features are coming up !
